properties.entry: SELECT * FROM V_ADOPTION WHERE BRD_NO = ? AND BRD_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BRD_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V_ADOPTION WHERE BRD_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT RNUM, TITLE, ADT_CODE, ADT_TYPE, ADT_BREED, ADT_GENDER, ADT_AGE, ADT_YN, N_NM, BRD_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM(SELECT * FROM V_ADOPTION WHERE BRD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC) V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM IMAGE WHERE BRD_NO IN (SELECT BRD_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM(SELECT * FROM V_ADOPTION WHERE BRD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC) V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND FILE_LEVEL = 0
INSERT INTO BOARD(BRD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, MEM_NO, BRD_TYPE) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = ?, CONTENT = ?, BRD_MODIFY = SYSDATE WHERE BRD_NO = ?
UPDATE ADOPTION SET ADT_CODE = ?, ADT_BREED = ?, ADT_GENDER = ?, ADT_AGE = ?, ADDRESS = ?, ADT_VACCINATION = ?, ADT_NOTE = ?, ADT_TIME = ?, ADT_YN = ? WHERE BRD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BRD_STATUS = 'N' WHERE BRD_NO = ?
